Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation (useful for searching or sending messages).
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen.

Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.name: Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option
Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.description: Reopen a dropdown menu at position (dropdown_x, dropdown_y) and select an option at position (option_x, option_y).
Reopen_And_Select_Sort_Option.precondition: A dropdown menu is present on the screen, and the desired option is visible after reopening the menu.
